title: coming up this weekend---48 hr tournament with restricted card usage!!!

comments.content: hey, i know this is a little last minute, but i will be posting a separate note at 5pm for a quick weekend tournament with restricted card use and a limited amount of attempts a player can use to submit a score.  more info to come in just a couple of hours, so get ready!!!
Fun! Hopefully with my limited supply of sets I can participate.
i think so, what do you have again?
Core, HFG, CaTC, JtR, and HoEM.
